content:
Striking new evidence has been discovered that shows the origins of one the worldâ€™s greatest dinosaurs, the Tyrannosaurus Rex. Although thought to have lived throughout what is now western North America, the bipedal predator may very well have hailed from further afield, as these fascinating images portray... Confused? Read on.

title: Incredible Origins of the Great Tyrannosaurus Rex Revealed
author: Linda
